jdbcService.sql: select distinct * from ~log_messages lm join ~log_message_data lmd on lmd.log_message_id = lm.id where (:alias is null or lm.alias = any(:alias)) and (:authenticationId is null or lm.authentication_id = any(:authenticationId)) and (:code is null or lm.code = any(:code)) and (:conversationId is null or lm.conversation_id = any(:conversationId)) and (:correlationId is null or lm.correlation_id = any(:correlationId)) and (:deviceId is null or lm.device_id = any(:deviceId)) and (:id is null or lm.id = any(:id)) and (:impersonatorAlias is null or lm.impersonator_alias = any(:impersonatorAlias)) and (:logType is null or lm.log_type = any(:logType)) and (:server is null or lm.server = any(:server)) and (:sessionId is null or lm.session_id = any(:sessionId)) and (:realm is null or lm.realm = any(:realm)) and (:impersonatorId is null or lm.impersonator_id = any(:impersonatorId)) and (:serviceContext is null or lm.service_context = any(:serviceContext)) and (:severity is null or lm.severity = any(:severity)) and (:triggerId is null or lm.trigger_id = any(:triggerId)) and (:triggerType is null or lm.trigger_type = any(:triggerType)) and (:since is null or lm.started >= :since) and (:until is null or lm.started < :since) and (:q is null or lower(lmd.value) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(lm.message) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' or lower(lm.description) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%')
